title: Calpol Peads 100ML Susp
details:
Calpol belongs to the group of analgesics, commonly known as pain killers. Calpol is made of the same formula as Paracetamol. It is given to children as pain relief or to lower the high body temperature. 

Uses 
Calpol
READ MORE
precautions: Inform the doctor about your complete medical history before taking this medicine.Always take medicine as recommended by the doctor. Do not use it for a prolonged period.Do not use other medications containing Paracetamol while taking Calpol.Over-dosage of Calpol may cause liver problems such as liver failure.Patients with renal or liver impairment must inform the doctor about their medical condition.Breast-feeding mothers can take this medication as it does not cause any serious health risk if taken in moderate amounts.Do not take medicine if you are allergic to any of the ingredients present in it.Do not give medicine to infants and toddlers without consulting the doctor.Stop using the medication if you experience any mild to severe allergies.Keep the medicine away from children.In case ofserious skin reaction immediately stop using the medicine.
effects: Calpol syrup may cause the following side-effects in case of excessive usage.DiarrhoeaAbdominal painSwellingChanges in appetite.Rare Side-EffectsFollowing are the rare side effects of the Calpol syrup. These symptoms only appear in case an infant or an adult is allergic to the ingredients present in the medicine. Rare side-effects of this medicine are as follows:Cloudy UrineUnbearable Stomach PainRashes on the skinWeakness or FatigueYellowing of eyesPale skinContinuous FeverShortness of BreathKidney painIf any of the above symptoms appear, immediately go to the nearby medical centre.

title: Panadol 60MG 30ML Drops
details: It contains "paracetamol" which is indicated for the treatment of fever and pain.
precautions: Keep it out of the reach of children. Store it below the room temperature i.e. below 25 degrees Celsius. Consult a doctor if you’re hypersensitive to any of its ingredients. Do not take overdose, always take it in a recommended dose.
effects: No side effects are reported. Consult a doctor if it causes digestive problems i.e. gas, bloating, abdominal pain, GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disease), vomiting, nausea, or diarrhea, etc. Allergic reactions may occur i.e. skin itching, rashes, irritations, redness, & inflammation/swelling, etc. Other effects are drowsiness, dizziness, sleepiness, headache, etc.

title: Provas Inj 1x5 (L)
details:

The tablet contains an active ingredient which is Paracetamol.

Uses
The injection is used for prevention, improvement, t

precautions: Before taking this medicine or injecting it, it is very important to consult a doctor and share the medical history of the patient regarding any disease or current health condition like pregnancy.Patients who are hypersensitive should not use this drug because it has active ingredient paracetamol, which may cause some serious allergic reaction to them.Patient having chest pain or liver problem should be cautioned while using this drug or first ask a doctor.It is advised not to take meds if the patients drink alcohol daily. It’s not safe for them.Patient with a liver problem or disease should not use this medication. It is not good for their health.The patients which are having the following problem should be cautioned; chronic alcoholism, hepatocellular insufficiency, dehydration, severe renal insufficiency and chronic malnutrition.Provas injection during pregnancyBefore using this medicine, it is important for pregnant women to consult a doctor first. If it is safe to use or not, so that it may not harm the baby.If it is safe to use, use as per directed by the doctor and use it in less amount, overdose can be very risky and can cause a problem.During breastfeedingThe Paracetamol in the medicine is excreted into the milk in a very little quantity. It can be used during the breastfeeding. As no effects have been seen or cases are reported.
effects: Every medicine has its benefits but side effects too. Some of them are rare, common but some are very serious. It is not important that side effects can occur every time, but it may occur.Some of the side effects which may occur are the:DiarrhoeaConstipationLoss of appetiteVomitingGI upsetSleeping problemSome of the serious side effects which may occur are:NauseaBlood dyscrasiasBreathing problemRedness of skinSwelling of faceRashesLiver toxicityLowering of white blood cellsAcute renal tubular necrosisUlcerAllergic reactionYellowish of skin and eyes.Immediately consult a doctor if the patient condition gets worse.

title: Feveral 100ML Inf
details: It is used to relieve pain and reduce high fever (temperature).
precautions: Keep out of the reach of children. Store at room temperature, i.e. below 30 degrees Celsius. Protect from heat, humidity, or direct exposure to sunlight. Avoid it if you're hypersensitive to any of its ingredients.
effects: It rarely causes any kinds of adverse reactions. Side effects may include digestive problems, i.e. vomiting, nausea, diarrhea, constipation, abdominal cramps, GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disease), heartburn, feeling of sickness, etc. Others are loss of appetite, drowsiness, headache, skin allergies, swelling, vision disorders, etc. Consult a doctor or seek a healthcare provider in case of any adverse reaction.

effects: Not every patient taking Bofalgan inj needs to suffer from its side effects. So, if you notice that any of its side effects is persisting or getting worsen, then immediately consult your doctor.Bofalgan inj side effects are listed below.The common side effects that can occur while taking the Bofalgan inj are diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, loss of appetite, loss of mouth taste, and constipation.It can also cause GI upset, and stomach upset.Its can cause some severe allergic problems to the patients having hypersensitivity problems from the ingredients used in its formula.Maybe all of the Bofalgan inj side effects are not listed above. title: Calpol 500MG Tab 20x10 (L)
details:
The most widely used tablet Calpol comes under the category of mild analgesics and an antipyretic class of drugs relieving pain and fever. The tablets are formulated on optizorb technology which releases medicine faster. The tablets are most comm

precautions: It is necessary to read all the precautionary measures before taking any medicine. The important Calpol tablets precautions are listed below.Do not take the tablets if you are allergic to paracetamol or any of the ingredients of Calpol.Inform your doctor about your medical history, allergies, and medication you are already using.Avoid using the tablets without a doctor's prescription in case of kidney disorder as the patient can be at increased risk of adverse effects.Avoid using the tablets without a doctor's prescription in case of any liver disorder.Inform your doctor before taking tablets if you are using blood-thinning medicines.Inform your doctor if you are using medicines to reduce cholesterol levels or to mitigate nausea effects.Notify your doctor in case of constant headaches and stop using the tablets.Inform your doctor prior to using the tablets if you are addicted to consuming alcohol.Calpol tablets for pregnancy is safe but it is recommended to use the tablets on a doctor's prescription.avoid taking the tablets without a doctor's prescription if you are lactating.Keep the tablets away from the reach of children.Place the tablets in a cool dry and safe place.Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Liver disease, Regular Use/Abuse of alcohol.
effects: There are not extreme side effects of using Calpol tablets. Calpol tablet is a commonly used over-the-counter medicine. It is not necessary that you will experience all of the side effects. The potential Calpol tablet side effects are listed below. Indigestion or stomach upset.Nausea or vomiting.Stomach pain.Diarrhea.Allergic reactions such as rashes.Running nose.Shortness of breath in extreme cases if taken an excessive number of tablets.Swelling.Easy bruising is also an extreme side effect.In case of extreme and prolonged adverse effects rush to your doctor immediately.This drug usually has no side effects, Allergic reactions may occur.
